title: Innersloth please read this
text:
hello innersloth! So I’ve been a player since 2021, and recently when I logged into my account it said “due to self-harm or violence you’re account has been permanently banned” now the reason behind this? I do not know. I never did anything to promote self-harm as to any violence. I don’t want to start a new account since my account had exclusive cosmetic’s. I don’t know if this is a mistake or not, but ether way please read this.

—to the innersloth team

title: Among Us
text: Really good game, no complaints.

title: Why play Among Us
text: A reason you should play Among Us is the cosmetics. So you can make your own character. Also it is really fun. There is hide and seek mode and classic. In hide and seek mode, you know who is the imposter. But in classic mode, you don’t know who the imposter is, but it is a mystery to figure out who the murder is………..😀

title: I have a serious charge
text: This game is overall fun, but there is one thing that makes me angry. You have a very idiotic policy: that if you leave the game intentionally, you cannot join for another couple minutes. I think that you should be ashamed of yourself for making that because other games don’t have that. I understand you don’t want people leaving just because they weren’t the impostor, but what if someone has to exit the game to do something other than sit here and play the game all day, which is pretty much what you assume, among us. If you do not fix the policy soon I will blow my stack and never play it, and along with that I will anti advertise it by telling everyone who plays it to either join me in my rebellion or stop playing.

title: Among us is cursed!😢😰
text:
Every time I play among us and join a game when I go to crew on chat there’s this thing where it has this red bloody background , three ??? on the right side and it has a yellow player with red shadows. If you have among us then please see if it happens to you and if it happens to you write a review of the thing described in my review in your own way and delete the app IMMEDIATELY!!!! Please stay safe and hope that that thing that helps ed to me isn’t a hacker or something or someone trying to track you thanks. Also, on last thing, when you write your review please mention me my name will be signed at the bottom. If you read this review please try and see if it happens to you then write a review and include me in it. Stay safe guys/girls😊💕

                                                   - Natalie

title: Dear developer of innersloth
text: Hi I’m Lily, And I am OBSESSED with Among Us! But I have one question… so like reactor, admin, and 02 you have to go to them to fix a crisis BUT they all have their own tasks in them except communication. I think it would be really fun to make comms have its own task. I had an idea like maybe the task could include having to listen to something and then typing in another area what you heard but that’s just one idea. Thank you for reading my idea!
